ここ１６年間毎年夏に集まっている仲間なので、それを名前にすることにしました。（絵に何故１２人しかいないと不思議に思っている方へ：最初の融資先に貢献した人数です！）

I just recently started but I am already so passionate about the company and think what these mentors do on a daily basis is such amazing work. I always wanted to give a bit like this even if it is in a small way, being in IT where my skills are but supporting such an important team of people in the field. 

Kiva is to me just as important in giving  anything to people much less fortunate than myself.

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: As a humanitarian, business entrepreneur as well as an advocate for equality, justice and peace, I feel that individuals deserve the opportunity to help themselves become better than their present conditions. I believe in the intertwining of our economies. There is a social responsibility to pave the future for a sound financial basis and economy for our futures.  The step to take on such a responsibility is a major decision in which we should embrace and learn.  Learn how all financial systems work in accordance to our own.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently pursuing my Masters degree as a dual major, in the fields of International business and education, my work is challenging but meaningful. Also I anticipate continuing my studies in the area Eastern/Western medicine on the Ph.D Level and furthering my interest in Global International affairs ultimately leading to the goal of ambassadorship of a country as well as other goals and endeavors.
